text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceType

Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/allergy-intolerance-type, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
immune Immune MediatedImmune mediated reaction, including allergic reactions and hypersensitivities.
non-immune Non-immune mediatedA non-immune mediated reaction, which can include pseudoallergic reactions, side effects, intolerances, drug toxicities (eg to Gentamicin), drug-drug interactions, food-drug interactions, and drug-disease interactions.

name: AllergyIntoleranceType
description: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk

concept.definition: Immune mediated reaction, including allergic reactions and hypersensitivities.

A non-immune mediated reaction, which can include pseudoallergic reactions, side effects, intolerances, drug toxicities (eg to Gentamicin), drug-drug interactions, food-drug interactions, and drug-disease interactions.
